name: Vince Lombardi
quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

name: Albert Einstein
quote: You never fail until you stop trying.

name: Nelson Mandela
quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

name: Walt Disney
quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: You may not control all the events that happen to you, but you can decide not to be reduced by them.

name: Steve Jobs
quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.

name: Thomas A. Edison
quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

name: Aristotle
quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.

name: John F. Kennedy
quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.

name: Henry Ford
quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.

name: Confucius
quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

name: Martin Luther King Jr.
quote: The time is always right to do what is right.

name: Oprah Winfrey
quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

name: Helen Keller
quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.

name: Mark Twain
quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did.

name: Winston Churchill
quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

name: Herman Melville
quote: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.

name: Thomas Jefferson
quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.

name: Napoleon Hill
quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: What you do speaks so loudly that I cannot hear what you say.

name: J.K. Rowling
quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

name: Zig Ziglar
quote: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: Do one thing every day that scares you.

name: Warren Buffet
quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.

name: Aristotle
quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.

name: Ayn Rand
quote: The question isn't who is going to let me; it's who is going to stop me.

name: Napoleon Bonaparte
quote: Victory belongs to the most persevering.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.

name: Thomas Edison
quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

name: Les Brown
quote: You don't have to be great to get started, but you have to get started to be great.

name: Harriet Tubman
quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.

name: Vince Lombardi
quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.

name: Mark Twain
quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

name: Henry Ford
quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.

name: Walt Disney
quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: You will face many defeats in your life, but never let yourself be defeated.

name: Steve Jobs
quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

name: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

quote: Imagination is more important than knowledge.

quote: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm.

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
